Title: Two Cents Worth of Hope
Writer: Renato Castellani (screenplay), Renato Castellani (story), Titina De Filippo (screenplay), Ettore Maria Margadonna (story)
Actors: Maria Fiore, Vincenzo Musolino, Filomena Russo, Luigi Astarita
Plot: The story concerns the romance between Carmela and Antonio. The ardor is one-sided at first, but Carmela is a determined young woman, willing to scale and conquer any obstacle in pursuing ...
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 5 wins.
